channel.title: Perfect ring!
channel.description:
How do i make a perfect ring work? I need it for me so i can pwn all the kids that attack me while i watch people pk.
If you got code please tell me.
Also, Im very sorry for posting this much i just started a server and im really needing help. MSN:Coder_Fatality@hotmail.com

item.title: Perfect ring!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Nader Owner Nader
item.description:
@Owner_Nader wrote:

goto item.cfg And change ur current perfect ring item and add this item = 773 K0_ring 1_hit_k0s_those_noobs. 1000000 10000000 10000000 999999 99999 99999 99999 9999999 999999 999999 999999 999999 999999 99999 999999

Read full topic

item.title: Perfect ring!
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Your Master:

And after… you know .-. >compile>restart server then go pwn kids.

Never knew that you could use Javac to compile a CFG file.

Read full topic

item.title: Perfect ring!
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

[quote=“koopa king, post:2, topic:282596”]Go into your item.cfg file and find your perfect ring. Then scroll right, and with all of the zeroes that are there, I believe the 14th zero is the strength bonus value. Change that to whatever you want it to be.[/quote]And after… you know .-. >compile>restart server then go pwn kids.

Read full topic

item.title: Perfect ring!
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Go into your item.cfg file and find your perfect ring. Then scroll right, and with all of the zeroes that are there, I believe the 14th zero is the strength bonus value. Change that to whatever you want it to be.

Read full topic
